__e: I am Mrs Stephens' father, here to share her magnificent experience.
Mr Stephens, may I see you for a moment, please, alone?
Look, Mrs. Stephens, I'm not the smartest person on the block but I can see you're very upset about something.
Stephens, you and your aunt just aren't Mother Jenny's Jam people.
I suppose Mrs. Stephens asked you to stop by and pick up something for your company.
Look, Mr. Stephens, you don't need luck to sell us this campaign, do you?
